discourse_list.title: Legal risks and currencies regarding Dai

content.content: I am looking into doing some investing into Dai stablecoin, however before doing so I am trying to gain as much knowledge of Dai and MakerDAO in general. What are the main legal risks when it comes to Dai stable coin? And how many currencies are there that users can use as collateral? Any guidance would be helpful.

Makerburn.com has a lot of information on collaterals. Legal risks is a broad question. The main one for Dai holders would be that one of the blacklistable collaterals is frozen, leaving Dai holdeds unable to withdraw it. It seems unlikely regulators would do that with no notice or recourse for Dai holders though. MKR holders have have additional legal risks around security laws and financial institution regulations.
